title: Specialised Topics in Family Law
description:
When a person refers to “family law”, listeners generally assume that the person is referring to divorce law. However, family law in Singapore encompasses much more, e.g. mental capacity, probate, and adoption.

This course will cover the above areas as well as more specialised topics in family law, e.g. relocation, cross border divorce and maintenance, child abduction, and therapeutic justice, and will also include an introduction to procedural and practical aspects of family law litigation.
prerequisite: NUS Compulsory Core Law Curriculum or equivalent.
preclusion: LL4452V/LL5452V/LL6452V/LLJ5452V Specialised Topics in Family Law
